metadata.title: CVE-2020-26146 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered on Samsung Galaxy S3 i9305 4.4.4 devices. The WPA,WPA2, and WPA3 implementations reassemble fragments with non-consecutivepacket numbers. An adversary can abuse this to exfiltrate selectedfragments. This vulnerability is exploitable when another device sendsfragmented frames and the WEP, CCMP, or GCMP data-confidentiality protocolis used. Note that WEP is vulnerable to this attack by design.

criterions.comment: linux package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
